meanings.definition: Resembling cloth in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The paper towel was so clothlike that it felt soft against my skin.
meanings.sent2: The new sofa had a clothlike covering that made it cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent3: The robot's clothlike skin made it look surprisingly human.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a clothlike quality, smooth and comforting.
meanings.sent5: The clouds had a clothlike texture, billowing and soft in the sky.
